title: Crypto Analyst Who Nailed Bitcoin’s Bear Market Bottom Predicts $BTC Will Surpss $30,000 After a Short Dip
description: A popular cryptocurrency analyst who gained a large following on social media after accurately calling Bitcoin’s 2018 bear market bottom above $3,000 has recently suggested the leading cryptocurrency is getting ready to surge above the $30,000 mark. In a newly published video shared on the microblogging platform X (formerly Twitter) with over 220,000 followers, the […]
